metadata.description: Lara hunts down Trinity in Antarctica and seeks to discover the mystery within their icy hideout before they can exploit it. Facing a new adversary who is more cunning and more prepared than expected, Lara must face the conflict residing within herself and decide how far she's willing to go, and what to let go of in the process. Collects Tomb Raider: Inferno #1-#4. ''Heavy on the action and crammed full of unexpected twists.'' -Infinite Earths
metadata.name: Tomb Raider: Inferno
